Takenouchi Kaguya is the daughter of Takenouchi Fumiya, the acting queen of the clan. Kaguya is the next in line for the position for queen but she refuses to be obedient and wants to enjoy life. The bratty Kaguya despises her mother and the people around her for being so strict and often wishes she was never born as a princess.  \n  \nQueen Fumiya has been severely ill for many years now, but has kept it from her daughter in order to protect her but her condition has worsened. The Umenouchi family takes this opportunity to start a coup and takes over the government. Knowing that she is not able to ensure her daughter’s safety on the moon, Fumiya sends Kaguya to Earth with the powerful katana that symbolizes her ownership of the moon. Without the sword, the Umenouchi family cannot usurp control of the moon. It's so cheap because the house is haunted by the spirit of a high school student whose corpse was found there.  \n  \nKogarashi doesn't think this is going to be a problem for him, and the rest of the house's tenants appear to be sexy women. Kogarashi has no desire to hurt a ghost girl, and instead he ends up agreeing to help her to figure out her unfinished business. That way, she can move onto the afterlife before turning evil and falling into hell. Soon Maki's anxiety fades - and he begins to anticipate the calls…?  \n  \n7) Beautiful Thing / Beloved  \nSugita is staying in the hospital because of his broken leg. That is until he witnesses an exchange between Dr Yamada and one of his collegues…  \n  \n8) Your Favorite Song  \nAtsurou has inherited the piano-tuning skills from his renowned grandfather and so far, business has been going well. That is until he receives a much anticioated request from the Benriya house to fix their antique piano. No matter what he does, the piano's young owner cannot be satisfied with his piano-tuning. Just what is wrong with this piano and its owner…?  \n  \n9) After  \nYour Favorite Song extra  \n  \nNote: The scanlator combined chapters 2 \u0026 3 into one chapter, and did the same with chapters 4 \u0026 5. 2ecf4cea-5c52-422e-b1b6-d6b76e7e7cf3:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"2ecf4cea-5c52-422e-b1b6-d6b76e7e7cf3","title":{"en":"Microman: The Small Giant + Red Powers"},"altTitles":[{"ja-ro":"Chiisana Kyojin Microman"},{"ja":"ミクロマン"},{"en":"Microman"},{"ja":"小さな巨人ミクロマン"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"relatedIdds":["aeae5983-9057-4ef0-92ef-93bd9e278204","b2240452-09ac-4d03-919d-a2660925dbd9"],"description":{"en":"\"Someday I'll definitely return... In the palm of your hand...\"\n\"Small Giant Microman\" \u0026 \"Microman Red Powers\" celebrating their 25th anniversary!\nReissued with a large volume of about 780 pages in total, including about 200 pages that have not been recorded.\n\nIn 1974, Takara (currently Takara Tomy) sent out a masterpiece SF toy series \"Microman\" . Even after the first development in 1980, it is a popular series that has been revived many times in response to its popularity.\nIn many of the product series that have been released intermittently like this, media development centered on comicalization has also been carried out. Among them, \"Small Giant Microman\", which is based on the toy series \"Microman Magne Powers\" developed in 1998, is the only animation work and boasts high name recognition. And based on the anime of the same name, the manga written by Hisashi Matsumoto is this work \"Small Giant Microman\".\n\nAlthough positioned as a \"comicalized\", this work, which began serialization in Kodansha's \"Comic Bonbon\" in 1997 in advance of the anime, has attracted a wide range of readers due to its attractive character modeling, unique story development, and sophisticated drawings. It gained popularity and continues to be highly rated to this day.\nHowever, while \"Small Giant Microman\", which was serialized in \"Comic Bonbon\" from the October 1998 issue to the December 1999 issue, was made into a book in all three volumes, the direct sequel \"Microman\" was serialized subsequently. Red Powers” ​​(serialized in the February 2000 issue to the July 2000 issue of Comic Bonbon) was not published in book form, and the only way to get a sense of the story was by looking at the actual magazine.\n\nTherefore, this time, with the cooperation of Professor Hisashi Matsumoto and related companies, we will publish \"Small Giant Microman\" and \"Microman Red Powers\" in a newly edited two-volume book.\nFor this publication, we have collected and scanned all the existing books and published magazines. The scanned images have been digitally restored, and the image quality has been updated to withstand republication.\n\nA5 version, this book will be sent in a large volume of about 780 pages in total for the first and second volumes. Please take it in your hand and check the ending of the story.\n\n★ Features of this book\n1. The first book that covers the manga works \"Small Giant Microman\" and \"Microman Red Powers\".\n2. A large volume of about 780 pages in total for the first and second volumes.\n3. The image quality has been greatly updated from the existing book by digital restoration."},"links":{"mu":"dq61suu"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"256c8bd9-4904-4360-bf4f-508a76d67183","name":{"en":"Sci-Fi"}},{"id":"50880a9d-5440-4732-9afb-8f457127e836","name":{"en":"Mecha"}}]}

2efd2512-e5b7-46e8-ad7a-ed485e75c42b:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"2efd2512-e5b7-46e8-ad7a-ed485e75c42b","title":{"en":"Konyaku Hakisaremashita ga, Shiawase ni Natte Misemasu wa! Anthology Comic"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"婚約破棄されましたが、幸せになってみせますわ！アンソロジーコミック"}],"description":{"en":"This is a series of manga anthologies based on popular “villainess” novels. The protagonists are all young noblewomen who were rejected by their fiancés for various reasons, but who did not let themselves be discouraged and found their own happiness. Each volume contains several short stories adapted by different artists and themed.\n\nVol.1:\n- Dai Baka Reijou no Furi wo shite Konyaku Haki wo Kaihishi Tsuzukete Kitakeredo, Sorosoro Genkai desu! (大バカ令嬢のフリをして婚約破棄を回避し続けてきたけれど、そろそろ限界です！) by Manaka Shima\n- Suterareta Reijou wa Houfuku no Kamen wo Koumuru (捨てられた令嬢は報復の仮面を被る) by Uma Ohagi\n- Fukou Taishitsu no Reijou desu ga Keiyaku shita Akuma ni Dekiaisare Sugite Shiawase ni Shika Narimasen! (不幸体質の令嬢ですが契約した悪魔に溺愛されすぎて幸せにしかなれません！) by Shiota Hiromichi\n- \"Onna no Kuse ni\" to Konyaku Hakisareta Reijou wa Ringoku no Outaishi ni Dekiaisareru (女のくせに」と婚約破棄された令嬢は隣国の王太子に溺愛される) by Yumemitsuki\n\nVol.2:\n- Jaku Mahou Reijou no Kakusei - Ame Mahou de Kanbatsu wo Owarase Ouhi ni narimashita (弱魔法令嬢の覚醒　～雨魔法で干ばつを終わらせ王妃になりました～) by Rokowi\n- Munou na Anata wo Zenryoku de Hitei shite Sashiagemasu! - Dorei Reijou kara no Sotsugyou (無能なあなたを全力で否定してさしあげます！～奴隷令嬢からの卒業～) by Shirase Rui\n- Nekomimi Onna ni Konyakusha wo Ubawaremashita ga, Osananajimi no Jinrou ni Dekiaisarete Shiawase desu! 2fac6520-8f5d-4e26-9305-a7e3ad771af7:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"2fac6520-8f5d-4e26-9305-a7e3ad771af7","title":{"en":"Black Swan (YAMAGISHI Ryouko)"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"黒鳥-ブラックスワン-"},{"ja-ro":"Kokucho"},{"ja-ro":"Kokucho -Black Swan-"},{"ja":"黒鳥"}],"lastChapter":"4","description":{"en":"*Unrelated to the film starring Natalie Portman, Yamagishi's Black Swan predates the Hollywood movie by 16 years*\n\nOne-shot compilation of Yamagishi focusing on the psychology and turmoil of ballet dancers. Includes the following:\n\n- **Black Swan** (黒鳥-ブラックスワン-, Kokucho - Black Swan) -\nThe real-life choreographic genius George Balanchine took five wives during his lifetime, all of whom were his \"muse,\" but none of them lasted long. \nThe work depicts their anguish in the form of a monologue by his fourth wife, Maria Tallchief, a real-life ballet dancer also known for her Native American ancestry. \nIn addition to Tallchief, Vera Zorina, his third wife, and Tanaquil Le Clercq, his fifth and last wife, also appear in the work. Wouldn't it be easier and quicker to die if I pave a flower path for the vampire hunter, the male lead?\nFirst, let's start with the ruined male lead's family.\nSpending too much time and money, she saved the male lead's family who was demoted to peasants. Please let me die soon!\n\nShe became a teacher to the original male lead and a supporter to the original female lead.\nI accidentally turned a dying boy into a family member and saved him, but that wouldn't be a big deal. I don't care if you are a monster. So please, stay by my side again.”\n“I don't believe in God. В нашей истории, парень, который работает в качестве привратника, и чье единственное умение — обжорство, умение, которое только делает его голодным.   \n  \n\n\n---","vi":"Fate, một người lính gác cổng thành, sống một cuộc sống với vô vàn rắc rối. Một ngày nọ, sau khi hạ gục một tên trộm cả gan đột nhập vào lâu đài, Fate đã khai phá được sức mạnh thật sự của《Bạo Thực》. Titans are typically several stories tall, seem to have no intelligence, devour human beings and, worst of all, seem to do it for pleasure rather than as a food source.\nA small percentage of humanity survived by walling themselves in a city protected by extremely high walls, even taller than the biggest of Titans. Flash forward to the present and the southern district of Shinganshina has not seen a Titan in over 100 years.\n\nTeenage boy Eren and his foster sister Mikasa witness something horrific as one of the outer district walls is damaged by a 60 meter (196.85 feet) Titan causing a breach in the wall. As the smaller Titans flood the city, the two kids watch in horror the tragic events that follow, as the Titans devour people unimpeded.\n\nEren vows that he will wipe out every single Titan and take revenge for all of mankind.\n\n---\n- **Won the Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2011**\n- **Won the Noma Publishing Culture Award in 2021**\n\n**Links:**\n- Alternative Official English - [Kodansha US](https://kodansha.us/series/attack-on-titan/), [Azuki](https://www.azuki.co/series/attack-on-titan), [Manga Planet](https://mangaplanet.com/comic/618e30af823f4), [MangaPlaza](https://mangaplaza.com/title/0303001570/?content_id=103030015700001), [Coolmic](https://coolmic.me/titles/524), [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10136/episode/312468) (U.S. Only)","es":"Hace varios cientos de años, los humanos casi fueron exterminados por los titanes. Pian turvamuurin murtaa jättiläismäinen titaani ja nuoret ihmissoturit joutuvat elämänsä haasteen eteen, kun verinen sota armotonta ja entistäkin ylivoimaisempaa vihollista vastaan käynnistyy jälleen...","fr":"Eren est un petit garçon rêvant de voyager dans le monde extérieur. Mais cela est impossible car il vit dans une ville fortifiée aux murailles dépassant les cinquante mètres de haut. Ces remparts sont nécessaires à la sécurité des habitants car ils sont les derniers représentants de l'humanité, obligés de se cacher pour échapper aux titans qui ont massacré la majeure partie du genre humain un siècle plus tôt. Eren est têtu: il ne se doute pas de la violence des combats qui ont opposé les hommes aux titans. Il décide de poster sa candidature pour devenir éclaireur, car il s'agit des seuls soldats autorisés à sortir de la ville pour en savoir plus sur les titans. Mais un beau jour, un géant parvient à détruire le mur qui protégeait la ville et ouvre la voie à plusieurs dizaines de ses congénères! Eren assiste impuissant à la mort atroce de sa mère qui finit dévorée. Os poucos sobreviventes fugiram, levantaram muralhas de 50 metros para se protegerem desses seres e tentarem viver em paz… Porém, 100 anos depois, a humanidade começa a pagar por seus anos de paz: um titã colossal aparece, destruindo a muralha e dando início a um cenário de carnificina e destruição. É nesse momento em que as vidas de Eren, Mikasa e Armin serão mudadas para sempre. E assim começa uma batalha épica entre a raça humana e esses seres. A busca pela sobrevivência e o desejo de liberdade são o que movem a humanidade.\n\n---\nA história do mangá aborda um mundo em que a humanidade vive em cidades protegidas por muros de 50 metros de altura para se defender das invasões externas dos temidos Titãs, criaturas gigantes com formato humano e que se alimentam apenas de seres humanos. São três páginas em que ele responde às perguntas dos fãs japoneses. Огромные гуманоиды не обладали ни речью, ни разумом, но при этом пожирали людей, как чипсы, а обычное оружие уровня XIX века оказалось бессильно. Остатки рода людского смогли выжить лишь за циклопическими стенами, которые тройным кольцом опоясали последние поля, города и деревни. Затишье продолжалось сто лет, за это время люди успокоились, армия была сокращена, а городская стража превратилась в дармоедов. Боеспособность сохранил лишь Разведкорпус – но кому нужны самоубийцы, что постоянно рискуют жизнью за стенами, когда можно спокойно сидеть за каменным забором?  \r\nУвы, все хорошее кончается. Ужасающий колосс сокрушил внешнюю стену «Мария», и гиганты уничтожили один из городов. Мать юного Эрена погибла, отец пропал, и парень, кипящий жаждой мести, вместе с приемной сестрой Микасой поступил в Корпус, чьи элитные бойцы могут побеждать гигантов один на один. Овладеть системой тросов, лебедок и газовых ускорителей нелегко, но лишь подобная техника помогает делать безумные прыжки и поражать монстров в затылок – единственное уязвимое место. Учиться надо быстро, ибо идет война, и действия врага становятся все агрессивнее – будто за безмозглыми горами плоти стоит чей-то чуждый разум. Или… не такой уж чуждый? 30954fc3-c206-4978-baac-782d86f4692f:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"30954fc3-c206-4978-baac-782d86f4692f","title":{"en":"Attack on Titan: LOST GIRLS"},"altTitles":[{"ru":"Атака Титанов - Потерянные Девушки"},{"ja":"進撃の巨人 LOST GIRLS"},{"ja-ro":"Shingeki no Kyojin - Lost Girls"}],"lastChapter":"10","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en","es","uk"],"relatedIds":["304ceac3-8cdb-4fe7-acf7-2b6ff7a60613"],"description":{"en":"Manga adaptation of the *LOST GIRLS* novel. The spin-off contains three stories about Annie and Mikasa.","ru":"Манга-адаптация новеллы LOST GIRLS. Спин-офф содержит три истории, рассказывающие об Анни и Микасе.   \n  \n**Рассказ первый (\"Стена Сина, прощай\")**: События происходят за день до 57 экспедиции за стены и вращаются вокруг Анни. Леонхарт просит Хитч об одной услуге, Хитч же требует взамен найти пропавшую девушку, которая убежала из дома. Анни соглашается, собственно с этого и начинается рассказ.   \n  \n**Рассказ второй (\"Потерянные в жестоком мире\")**: После падения в Тросте, Микаса увидела мимолетное видение. Видение о том, как бы сложилась ее дружба с Эреном, если бы похитители не ворвались в дом Аккерманов.  \n  \n**Рассказ третий (\"Потерянные девушки\")**: Небольшой диалог Анни и Микасы."},"links":{"al":"95409","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/B0756YFGJ3","ap":"attack-on-titan-lost-girls","bw":"series/65986/list","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/356464/","engtl":"https://comics.inkr.com/title/2088-attack-on-titan-lost-girls?utm_source=mgd","kt":"36207","mal":"91047","mu":"124075","raw":"https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/10834108156640551954"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"07251805-a27e-4d59-b488-f0bfbec15168","name":{"en":"Thriller"}},{"id":"36fd93ea-e8b8-445e-b836-358f02b3d33d","name":{"en":"Monsters"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"5fff9cde-849c-4d78-aab0-0d52b2ee1d25","name":{"en":"Survival"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"9467335a-1b83-4497-9231-765337a00b96","name":{"en":"Post-Apocalyptic"}},{"id":"ac72833b-c4e9-4878-b9db-6c8a4a99444a","name":{"en":"Military"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}
